channel.title: BOJ on Chunbong
channel.description: Recent content in BOJ on Chunbong

item.title: BOJ_1920 수 찾기
item.description:
문제
Code - 이진탐색 import sys sys.setrecursionlimit(10000) n = int(input()) a = list(map(int, input().split())) m = int(input()) nums = list(map(int, input().split())) def binary_search(target, start, end, data): if start > end: return 0 mid = (start + end) // 2 if data[mid] == target: return 1 if data[mid] < target: start = mid + 1 else: end = mid - 1 return binary_search(target, start, end, data) a.sort() for i in range(m): print(binary_search(nums[i], 0, n-1, a))
